Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class EventHandlerCLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.EventHandlerCLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventToClientVisitor
public class EventHandlerCLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventToClientVisitor
This class is an event parser, takes the information from the events received from the server and then calls the CLIHandler to visualize them
Author:
Mirko Genoni

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EventHandlerCLI​(ConnectionToServer connectionToServer)
    Constructor of the class initializes all the data structure

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void acquire()
    This method handles a semaphore for all the thread created in this class, for every event received the class creates a thread, then calls this method to prevent the handle and the print of more than one event at the time
    void notifyDisconnection()
    This method notifies to the client a disconnection to the server
    void receiveEvent​(EventToClient event)
    This method permits to the connection with the server to pass the receive event to this class
    void visit​(EndGameToClient message)
    Visit method of the end game event.
    void visit​(SendNamePlayerRequestToClient nameRequest)
    Visit method of the player name request event.
    void visit​(SendNumPlayerRequestToClient numPlayer)
    Visit method of the number of players request event.
    void visit​(SendRoomRequestToClient roomRequest)
    Visit method of the room request event.
    void visit​(LorenzoActionToClient lorenzoAction)
    Visit method of the lorenzo action event.
    void visit​(NewTurnToClient newTurn)
    Visit method of the new turn event.

    Visit method of the notify event.
    void visit​(PingToClient ping)
    Visit method of the ping event.

  • Method Details

    • receiveEvent

      public void receiveEvent​(EventToClient event)
      This method permits to the connection with the server to pass the receive event to this class
      Parameters:
      event - The event passed by the connection with the server

    • acquire

      public void acquire()
      This method handles a semaphore for all the thread created in this class, for every event received the class creates a thread, then calls this method to prevent the handle and the print of more than one event at the time

    • notifyDisconnection

      public void notifyDisconnection()
      This method notifies to the client a disconnection to the server
